dmca.title: [ABUSE] FW: FA Premier League: AV infringement - FAPL_NRID13196
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
Policy Enforcement
Sent: Wednesday, April 12, 2006 10:45 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] FW: FA Premier League: AV infringement -
FAPL_NRID13196]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/


- -------- Original Message --------
From:         - Wed Apr 12 10:41:24 2006
X-Mozilla-Status:         0001
X-Mozilla-Status2:         00000000
Received:         from localhost ([127.0.0.1] helo=[216.185.111.52]) by
mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com)
with esmtp (Exim) id 1FThRj-0007Vn-LY; Wed, 12 Apr 2006 10:39:55 -0500
Received:         from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181]
helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from
TimC@nr-online.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id
1FThRi-0007VY-6G for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 12 Apr 2006 10:39:54 -0500
Received:         from email.nr-online.com ([217.204.130.186]) by
mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from TimC@nr-online.com) with esmtps
(TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1FThRf-0009ne-AM for
abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 12 Apr 2006 10:39:53 -0500
Received:         (qmail 2242 invoked by uid 89); 12 Apr 2006 16:38:44 +0100
Received:         from unknown (HELO D6YK112J) (192.168.50.112) by 0 (qmail
1.03 + ejcp v14) with SMTP; 12 Apr 2006 16:38:44 +0100
From:         Tim Cooper <TimC@nr-online.com>
To:         <adminfss@gmail.com>
Date:         Wed, 12 Apr 2006 16:39:44 +0100
MIME-Version:         1.0
Content-Type:         multipart/alternative;
boundary="----=_NextPart_000_00E7_01C65E4F.B4180C20"
X-Mailer:         Microsoft Office Outlook, Build 11.0.6353
Thread-Index:         AcZeRmggHnN2UN6zQrme2y+yVcqIlAAAM0Lg
X-MimeOLE:         Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2670

designates 217.204.130.186 as permitted sender) client-ip=217.204.130.186;
envelope-from=TimC@nr-online.com; helo=email.nr-online.com;
X-Spam-Level:         ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score:         -99.0
Cc:         abuse@theplanet.com
Subject:         [ABUSE] FW: FA Premier League: AV infringement -
FAPL_NRID13196
X-BeenThere:         abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version:         2.1.7
Precedence:         list
List-Id:         <abuse.lists.theplanet.com>
List-Unsubscribe:         <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post:         <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help:         <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe:         <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com



NetResult Internal Reference:  FAPL_NRID13196



Please quote the above FAPL_NRID13196 reference in all communications with
us regarding this issue.



Dear Sirs



The FA Premier League has the exclusive right to commercially exploit all
matches within The FA Premier League championships including, but not
limited to, all moving images and other audio/video content.



We have noticed that your Web Site http://fss.portaliraton.net/ is
displaying and/or offering The FA Premier League's audio visual content.



As you have neither sought nor obtained permission from The FA Premier
League to use this content, your present use is an infringement of The FA
Premier League's rights.



Please immediately cease all such infringements on any and all of your web
sites and confirm to us via email that you have done so.



Nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute an
express or implied waiver of any of The FA Premier League's rights or
remedies, including any rights or remedies in respect of infringement not
explicitly stated, whether current or in the future, all of which are
expressly reserved.





Formal Declaration





I hereby state that The FA Premier League is the owner of the exclusive
rights referenced above and that NetResult is authorised to act on its
behalf with respect to internet monitoring and compliance. On behalf of The
FA Premier League I hereby state that I have a good faith belief that use of
the content in the manner complained of is not authorised by The FA Premier
League, its agents, or the law.



[I, Tim Cooper, as a representative of NetResult hereby digitally sign this
e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United States
of America with the additional statement under penalty of perjury that the
information in the notice is accurate.]







Yours sincerely,





Tim Cooper

NetResult

A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd

Mulberry House

583 Fulham Road

London

UK SW6 5UA

Tel: +44 (0)20 7471 1730

Fax:

Head Office: Projector NetResult Ltd, 8 Wye Street, Hereford, UK HR2 7RB



Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, please

accept our apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail

immediately to the correct person or department for action.





- --------------------------------------------------------------------

NetResult - World Leaders in Online Intellectual Property Management

- --------------------------------------------------------------------
